message.content:
Certainly! Here’s a list of 50 “message of the day” quotes related to American politics, formatted as an array of JSON objects:

```json
[
    {"message": "Democracy is not a spectator sport.", "author": "Marian Wright Edelman"},
    {"message": "The ballot is stronger than the bullet.", "author": "Abraham Lincoln"},
    {"message": "Injustice anywhere is a threat to justice everywhere.", "author": "Martin Luther King Jr."},
    {"message": "Politics is the art of looking for trouble, finding it everywhere, misdiagnosing it, and then misapplying the wrong remedies.", "author": "Groucho Marx"},
    {"message": "A government of the people, by the people, for the people, shall not perish from the Earth.", "author": "Abraham Lincoln"},
    {"message": "The only thing necessary for the triumph of evil is for good men to do nothing.", "author": "Edmund Burke"},
    {"message": "Every election is determined by the people who show up.", "author": "Louis L'Amour"},
    {"message": "To deny people their human rights is to challenge their very humanity.", "author": "Nelson Mandela"},
    {"message": "Government's first duty is to protect the people, not run their lives.", "author": "Ronald Reagan"},
    {"message": "The best way to predict the future is to create it.", "author": "Peter Drucker"},
    {"message": "We do not inherit the earth from our ancestors; we borrow it from our children.", "author": "Native American Proverb"},
    {"message": "The price of apathy towards public affairs is to be ruled by evil men.", "author": "Plato"},
    {"message": "A nation that forgets its past has no future.", "author": "Winston Churchill"},
    {"message": "If you want peace, work for justice.", "author": "Pope Paul VI"},
    {"message": "Liberty means responsibility. That is why most men dread it.", "author": "George Bernard Shaw"},
    {"message": "Change is the law of life. And those who look only to the past or present are certain to miss the future.", "author": "John F. Kennedy"},
    {"message": "Those who stand for nothing fall for anything.", "author": "Alexander Hamilton"},
    {"message": "History will judge us by the difference we make in the everyday lives of children.", "author": "Nelson Mandela"},
    {"message": "Courage is not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it.", "author": "Nelson Mandela"},
    {"message": "We have a duty to fight for our freedom.", "author": "Assata Shakur"},
    {"message": "The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.", "author": "Eleanor Roosevelt"},
    {"message": "Democracy is the government of the people, by the people, for the people.", "author": "Abraham Lincoln"},
    {"message": "The road to power is paved with hypocrisy and casualties.", "author": "George Orwell"},
    {"message": "A great democracy must be progressive or it will soon cease to be great or a democracy.", "author": "Theodore Roosevelt"},
    {"message": "There are no constraints on the human mind, no walls around the human spirit, no barriers to our progress except those we ourselves erect.", "author": "Ronald Reagan"},
    {"message": "Power concedes nothing without a demand. It never did and it never will.", "author": "Frederick Douglass"},
    {"message": "An informed citizenry is at the heart of a dynamic democracy.", "author": "Thomas Jefferson"},
    {"message": "Good government is no substitute for self-government.", "author": "Mahatma Gandhi"},
    {"message": "People should not be afraid of their governments. Governments should be afraid of their people.", "author": "V for Vendetta"},
    {"message": "The best thing about the future is that it comes one day at a time.", "author": "Abraham Lincoln"},
    {"message": "Let us not seek to satisfy our thirst for freedom by drinking from the cup of bitterness and hatred.", "author": "Martin Luther King Jr."},
    {"message": "One person can make a difference, and everyone should try.", "author": "John F. Kennedy"},
    {"message": "Together we can change the world, just one random act of kindness at a time.", "author": "Ron Hall"},
    {"message": "In a democracy, the highest office is the office of citizen.", "author": "Lewis H. Lapham"},
    {"message": "Fear can hold you prisoner. Hope can set you free.", "author": "Stephen King"},
    {"message": "The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.", "author": "Franklin D. Roosevelt"},
    {"message": "Life should be lived on the edge of a precipice. You need to weigh your options and take calculated risks.", "author": "David Brooks"},
    {"message": "The struggle for freedom is ultimately a struggle for the heart and soul of a nation.", "author": "Barack Obama"},
    {"message": "In a time of deceit telling the truth is a revolutionary act.", "author": "George Orwell"},
    {"message": "When they go low, we go high.", "author": "Michelle Obama"},
    {"message": "Our lives begin to end the day we become silent about things that matter.", "author": "Martin Luther King Jr."},
    {"message": "A lie can travel halfway around the world while the truth is putting on its shoes.", "author": "Jonathan Swift"},
    {"message": "Politics is too important to be left to the politicians.", "author": "James C. Humes"},
    {"message": "We may have all come on different ships, but we're in the same boat now.", "author": "Martin Luther King Jr."},
    {"message": "Freedom is never more than one generation away from extinction.", "author": "Ronald Reagan"},
    {"message": "Politics is not a game. It is an earnest business.", "author": "Winston Churchill"},
    {"message": "Citizenship is a tough occupation which obliges the citizen to make his own informed opinion and to be responsible.", "author": "Robert R. McCarthy"}
]
```

Feel free to modify or use them as needed!
